Improvements: Massively simplified the config system, values should now all make sense and reflect correctly in-game
Added better tooltips for some config editor fields
Updated RU locale to be inline with the EN locale
BugFixes: Crafts should now exist for RU locales.
Fixed skill buffs zeroing out after a scav raid
Fixed missing `Old House` door on woods
Fixed missing `Knossos LLC facility` door on shoreline (Labyrinth still WIP)

Improvements: Removed a bunch of debug logging from release builds
BugFixes: Fixed excessive skill share ratio being applied to the Eastern Weapons skill when using NATO weapons

Features: The Resurrection of the mod from its eternal bit nap in the cloud.
